page.title: 12HOMELIFE - SUNDAY
page.content: Some people go to church on Sunday morning. On Saint George's Day the Brownies did a play in the church about Saint George. We pretended to be a dragon by putting two curtains over us. The dragon was going to eat the princess but Saint George killed the dragon. I enjoyed it when George killed the dragon because we all fell over and giggled. The Sunday before last we had beef, peas, chips and yorkshire pudding for lunch. Afterwards we had ice cream. Sometimes I go downstairs because I can smell the cooking. My mum does not let me help her because she can do it faster by herself. Some Sunday afternoons my dad takes me swimming. I can swim underwater.My dad sometimes goes on a motor bike run and we go with him. There is a parade. Some bikes are very old and some quite new.
